titleStmt.title: A sermon preached at the funeral of the honourable Colonel Robert Rolle of Heanton Sachville in the county of Devon esq; by William Trevethick M.A. and pastor of Petrockslow in the same county
titleStmt.author: Trevethick, William, 1612 or 13-1693.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by T.R. for Edward Brewster at the Crane in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: With marginal notes and 3 final advertisment pages.
Copy has print show-through; tightly bound.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
